subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Team owner Rick Hendrick removed Tony Eury Jr. from his position as Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s crew chief, ending months of speculation concerning Earnhardt’s struggles.
snippet: Team owner Rick Hendrick removed Tony Eury Jr. from his position as Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s crew chief, ending months of speculation concerning Earnhardt’s struggles.
